name: ElViS
body:
### An application for monitoring ElarmS system Elarms is an Earthquake Early Warning System (EEWS), developed at Berkeley Seismological Lab (http://seismo.berkeley.edu/). This tool is aimed for visually monitoring the ElarmS system.
Created by Ran Novitsky Nof (ran.rnof.info), 2014. #### DEPENDENCIES: - swig - http://swig.org python (tested on 2.7) modules: - numpy - http://numpy.org - obspy - http://obspy.org - matplotlib - http://matplotlib.org - PyQt4 - http://www.riverbankcomputing.com - stomp - https://github.com/jasonrbriggs/stomp.py C external software (included as c files): - geodesic - http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/html/C/ #### INSTALL: on terminal at main directory, run: ``` make ``` #### USAGE: 
ElViS.py [-h] [cfgfile]

positional arguments:  
  cfgfile     Configuration file.

optional arguments:  
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
